welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Alma, Canada! Surrounded by stunning natural beauty and known for its delicious seafood, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our charming city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Alma Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Alma Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Roberval Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Refuge Cove SPB Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Refuge Cove SPB Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.
